- Vertical calendar design for easier dates selection
- Previous special rate codes are stored for faster search
- Specific rates displayed according to member tier in selected properties in China
- Various bug fixes

Thanks for using our RH App! We are constantly improving this app. Send your comments to rh.appfeedback@radissonhotels.com
This update includes bug fixes and enhancements.

Bug fixes:
-Room amenities icons show descriptions when you tap on them
-Fixed in the check-out: credit card number and expiration date fields format validity
-Fixed in the check-out : expiration session message
-Fixed in Account the tier expiration date
-Offers – countries list is now ordered alphabetically

Enhancements:
-Improved display of cancellation date and breakfast in the rates
-In the check-out, guests details and bed preference are now pre-filled for faster booking
